headline: WEC Energy Group (NYSE:WEC) Declares 89 Cents Dividend for 331st Consecutive Quarter
summary: WEC Energy Group (NYSE:WEC) reaffirmed its commitment to shareholder value by announcing a quarterly dividend of 89 cents per share, payable on June 1, 2025, marking its 331st consecutive payout. The company also reported strong Q4 2024 earnings, with net income doubling to $453.5 million year-over-year. During the last quarter, WEC's share price increased by 9%, which aligns with the broader market's performance over the past year. This stability, supported by consistent dividend payments...
